gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 109, Spurs 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Spurs, 109-102. Kawhi Leonard led all scorers with 26 points, four rebounds, and four assists for the Clippers, while Paul George added 24 points and eight rebounds in the victory. Victor Wembanyama tallied a team-high 22 points and 15 rebounds for the Spurs in the losing effort. The Clippers have won their 3rd consecutive game and improve to 6-7 on the season, while the Spurs fall to 3-12.
